articles.author: Rahul Nagaraj
articles.title: Tesla conducting massive layoffs, including senior executives - Team-BHP
articles.description: According to media reports, American EV maker Tesla is said to be massively downsizing its workforce. Having already reduced its global workforce by 10% earlier, fresh reports now suggest that Tesla is laying off even more employees - this time including seni…
